text:
Hairstyles can really change your impression, right?
Maybe I should try various hairstyles too.

Yeah, it can be a refreshing change...
and you might be surprised how some hairstyles suit you.

If I were to try a new hairstyle...
what do you think would be good, Producer!?

Meguru would probably look good
in a shorter hairstyle too.

Short hair, huh...!
Yeah, it would definitely give a different vibe!

Oh, really!?
I'm actually quite fond of my current hairstyle!

Not changing the length, but trying different hair arrangements
might also be a good way to change the impression.

For me...?
I think... just as I am, Meguru is good.

Just as you are is already enough...
Um, cute, that is.
